param.name: show_page_title
param.label: Show/hide page title
param.description: Show/hide page title

param.name: pageclass_sfx
param.label: Page css class
param.description: Page css class (leave blank)

param.name: page_title
param.label: Page Title
param.description: Page Title

param.name: jsme_height
param.label: JSME height (px)
param.description: JSME height in pixel

param.name: jsme_width
param.label: JSME width (px)
param.description: JSME width in pixel

param.name: jsme_xbutton
param.label: Show/hide the X button
param.description: Show / hide the X button (default is xbutton)

param.name: jsme_rbutton
param.label: Show/hide the R button
param.description: Show / hide the R button (to mark connection of substituent with the main scaffold)

param.name: jsme_atommovebutton
param.label: Show/hide the atom move button
param.description: Show / hide the atom move button (default is noatommovebutton)

param.name: jsme_hydrogens
param.label: Display/hide hydrogens
param.description: Display/hide hydrogens on heteroatom labels (default is hydrogens)

param.name: jsme_keephs
param.label: Remove hydrogens when reading a molecule
param.description: Remove hydrogens when reading a molecule with explicit hydrogens (default is keephs). This option can be used to remove hydrogens when pasting a structure with explicit hydrogens comning from e.g. the Pubchem database

param.name: jsme_keephs1
param.label: Remove hydrogens bounded to C
param.description: Remove hydrogens bounded to C when reading a molecule with explicit hydrogens (default is keephs). This option can be used to remove hydrogens when pasting a structure with explicit hydrogens comning from e.g. the Pubchem database

param.name: jsme_noquery
param.label: Enable/disable query features
param.description: Enable/disable query features (default is noquery). In query mode, a SMARTS is generated when a smiles is requested.

param.name: jsme_autoez
param.label: Automatic generation of SMILES
param.description: Automatic generation of SMILES with E,Z stereochemistry

param.name: jsme_canonize
param.label: SMILES canonicalization
param.description: SMILES canonicalization and detection of aromaticity supressed (default is canonize)

param.name: jsme_stereo
param.label: Stereochemistry not considered
param.description: Stereochemistry not considered when creating SMILES (default is stereo)

param.name: jsme_reaction
param.label: Enable/disable reaction input
param.description: Enable/disable reaction input

param.name: jsme_multipart
param.label: Possibility to enter multipart structures
param.description: Possibility to enter multipart structures (default nomultipart)

param.name: jsme_polarnitro
param.label: Prevent automatic conversion of nitro
param.description: Prevent automatic conversion of nitro (and similar) groups into nonpolar form (default is nopolarnitro)

param.name: jsme_number
param.label: Mark atoms
param.description: Possibility to number (mark) atoms

param.name: jsme_star
param.label: Possibility to highlight an atom
param.description: Possibility to highlight an atom (default is nostar). All highlighted atoms will have an atom number equal to 1. The atom numbers are included in the exported SMILES and MOL.

param.name: jsme_depict
param.label: Show/hide editing buttons
param.description: The applet will appear without editing buttons, this is used for structure display only (default nodepict)

param.name: jsme_paste
param.label: Enabling or disabling the paste action
param.description: enabling and disabling the paste action including drop of a MOL/RXN on the applet., can be used together with the depict option to have a read only depiction

param.name: jsme_border
param.label: Displays a border
param.description: (used together with the depict option) - displays a border around depicted molecule (default is noborder)

param.name: jsme_look
param.label: JME look
param.description: Turn on/off the old Java based JME look (default is newlook)
